Content: 20*p44493a02024* *(d) by the end of 1951, the world was in the midst of the biggest polio epidemic in history (paragraph 19).  this was caused by poliovirus which can lead to paralysis (paragraph 20).  the virus infects motor neurones which can stop skeletal muscles from working.  explain how the structure of the cell surface membrane of a motor neurone is related to the conduction of a nerve impulse along its axon.(6)
